org.middleheaven.core.wiring
Interface Scope

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractScopePool, NewInstanceScope, ServiceScope, SharedScope
public interface Scope

Interface for all pools that belong to a scope. scoped objects are maintained in pools. These pools are abstract in the sense they may be empty in reality. If the pool does not contain the object it requests it to the passed resolver.

getInScope

java.lang.Object getInScope(ResolutionContext context,
                            WiringQuery query,
                            Resolver resolver)
Obtain the specified object from this scope. If the object is not in the scope, use the resolver to retrieve it , and then put in the scope.

Parameters:
context - the resolution context
query - the procured object specification
resolver - the resolver to create the object if it is not in scope.
Returns:
